title: Technology-Enhanced Learning Strategies for Professional Competency Development

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital tool usage experience and intermediate-level expertise in the relevant field (medical/legal/technical)
context.additional_context: Learners study via 5-10 minute modular content accessible on mobile devices, with immediate feedback through formative assessments

learning_goals: Learners can distinguish and explain the core elements of technology-enhanced learning strategies (efficiency innovation, sustainable innovation, technology application cases).
Learners can diagnose practical problems by applying qualitative content analysis techniques in a mobile-based microlearning environment.
Learners can propose at least three technology integration plans applicable to their work processes based on acquired strategies.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
